content.text:
[@luandro](@2RNGJafZtMHzd76gyvqH6EJiK7kBnXeak5mBWzoO/iU=.ed25519) 

Do you have any plans to put up your own tower? I've been talking to Florian from [Growing Tower](https://www.growingtower.de/) and he's been working on a building technique that lets you build strong towers without ladders or cranes. Maybe useful? https://youtu.be/brrANrfcFk4
